item.title: Frameworkless JavaScript with npm and browserify
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: I don’t tend to use frameworks, as a personal preference I like feature driven, organic code bases. This often leads to questions about structure and organisation. Come along to find out how simple life can be without frameworks, and what the world looks like when you’re not limited by the chains they bring.
item.content:encoded:
I don’t tend to use frameworks, as a personal preference I like feature driven, organic code bases. This often leads to questions about structure and organisation.
Come along to find out how simple life can be without frameworks, and what the world looks like when you’re not limited by the chains they bring.

item.title: You have ruined JS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: It’s time to have a conversation about JavaScript. You see, I think you’re ruining it. You with your frameworks and your layers of indirection and directives. You with your angulars and your embers and your backbones and your model view controllers. So we’re going to have this conversation and see if we can’t straighten a […]
item.content:encoded: It’s time to have a conversation about JavaScript. You see, I think you’re ruining it. You with your frameworks and your layers of indirection and directives. You with your angulars and your embers and your backbones and your model view controllers. So we’re going to have this conversation and see if we can’t straighten a few things up – nice and gentle like. This will only take a few moments of your time after which everything will be different.
